title: A Man Holding Two Bunches of Flowers; Zodiacal Sign of Taurus
description: A Man Holding Two Bunches of Flowers; Zodiacal Sign of Taurus; Master of the Brussels Initials (Italian, active about 1389 - 1410); Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy; between 1389 and 1404; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 33 x 24 cm (13 x 9 7/16 in.); Ms. 34, fol. 2v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
